channel.title: Homes on Linlin Chen @ IIT
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Linlin Chen @ IIT

item.description: Biography Greetings! My name is Linlin Chen. I am now a fourth year Ph.D candidate at Department of Computer Science, Illinois Institute of Technology(IIT). I am supervised by Prof. Xiang-Yang Li and Prof. Peng-Jun Wan. My research interests span in data privacy & security in deep learning and machine learning. I like taking challenges and solving practical problems. I received my Bachelor of Engineering degree from the School of Computer Science, University of Science and Technology of China(USTC), 2015.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Internship JD Digits (JD Finance), Mountain View, CA, May. 2018 - Aug. 2018 Institute of Computing Technology, China Academy of Science, Mar. 2015 - Jun. 2016 Research Assistant WINET Lab lab @ IIT, supervised by Peng-Jun Wan, Aug. 2016 - Present WINET Lab lab @ IIT, supervised by Prof. Xiang-Yang Li, Aug. 2015 - May. 2016 LINKE Lab @ USTC, , Supervised by Prof. Xiang-Yang Li, Summer, 2016 & 2017 UBRI Lab @ USTC, Supervised by Prof.

item.description: &copy FYI: The following materials are copyrighted by the corresponding publishers. I download them from the Internet and attach some PDF files only for self-studying and research. If any violations exist, please contact me to delete. 1. Papers     1.1 Deep Learning     1.2 Data Privacy & Security     1.3 Mobile Computing     1.4 Learning & Security 2.
